All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AmbientLight
Ambient light for all 3D objects Ambient light represents a fixed-intensity and fixed color light source that affects all the object in the scene equally the ambient light intensity in point is IP=Ka*Ia
Camera
Camera producing rays through a view plane
CameraTest
 
Color
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
Cylinder
Finite Cylinder in 3D space
CylinderTest
 
DirectionLight
class direction light
Double3
This class will serve all primitive classes based on three numbers
finalImage
 
FlatGeometry
marker interface for flat Geometry
Geometries
class for intersectable for more than one shape with a ray.

unit tests for Geometries class
Geometry
interface for all geometries
image2
 
ImagesTest
 
ImageWriter
Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
ImageWriterTest
 
IntegrationTest
 
Intersectable
common interface for all graphic objects that intersect with a rayRay

Tests for reflection and transparency functionality, test for partial shadows (with transparency)
